title: Legacy of the Storm
overview: In the early years of the Ming Dynasty, turmoil swept through the martial world as various sects, driven by greed, waged war against one another in pursuit of the power of the Four Divine Artifacts. Amid this great catastrophe, the chivalrous hero Gao Lingfeng, while uncovering the truth behind a city's destruction and the mystery of his own origins, crosses paths with Sun Chenxi. As paragons of courage and justice, the two join forces to eliminate villains and thwart the sinister schemes of Xuanhuo Sect. Eventually, they succeed in obtaining one of the Four Divine Artifacts, the Azure Dragon's Essence, and Gao Lingfeng finally unravels the secrets behind his past. Together, he and Sun Chenxi take on the solemn duty of seeking the remaining artifacts to safeguard peace across the land...
